title: Thendrale Thendrale Lyrics Kadhal Desam
stanzas:
Thendrale thendrale
mella nee veesu.
poovudun mella
nee paesu. (2)

karaiyin madiyil
nadhiyum thoongum
kavalai marandhu thoongu.

iravin madiyil
ulagam thoongum
iniya kanavil thoongu.

Thendrale thendrale
mella nee veesu.
poovudun mella
nee paesu.

kadhal endraal kavalaiya
kannil neerin thivalaiyaa
noiyaanen uyirum neeyaanen

iravil kaayum muzhu nila
enakku mattum sudum nila
vaaraayo enai ne seraayo

thoonga vaikkum nilave
thookkamindri neeye
vaadinaayo

Thendrale thendrale
mella nee veesu.
poovudun mella
nee paesu

maalai vaanil
kathirum saayum
madiyil saaindhu thoongada
boomi yaaum
thoongum podhu
poovai neeyum thoongada

malarin kaadhal
panikku theriyum
en manadhil
kadhal theriyumaa

solla vaarthai kodithaan
unai neril kandaal
mounam yaen
thoonga vaikka paadien
naan thookkamindri
vaadinen.

Thendrale thendrale
mella nee veesu.
poovudun mella
nee paesu (2)

karaiyin madiyil
nadhiyum thoongum
kavalai marandhu thoongu.

iravin madiyil
ulagam thoongum
iniya kanavil thoongu.

Thendrale thendrale
mella nee veesu.
poovudun mella
nee paesu.
